Worlds.Name: A Simple Fishing World
Worlds.Description: ［ Catch Fish using Physics Based Rodsǃ ］［ Complete your FishDexǃ ］ ［ Relax in a peaceful Environmentǃ ］ ⁄⁄ v27 - Spring is hereǃ New items in the seasonal shopǃ

Worlds.Name: Elite's RNG Land
Worlds.Description: Reach for the stars as you put your luck to the ultimate test․ Roll for Auras of various chances and display your luckiness to your friendsǃ World is currently in active development․

Worlds.Name: Charlotte's Sunflower Island~ひまわり咲く癒しの港町
Worlds.Description: ひまわりが一年中咲き誇る常夏の港町。涼しい海風に乗って、空飛ぶクジラが歌っているよ。波の上の電車、青空カフェ、灯台。アイスでも食べながら町を歩こう。明日もきっと、幸せな日。Many sunflowers are blooming in the harbor town․ Whales are singing in the sea breeze as they fly through the sky․

Worlds.Name: 日本語話者向け集会場「FUJIYAMA」JP
Worlds.Description: マッチング用タグマーカー搭載！日本語話者向け集会場「FUJIYAMA」 公式X（旧Twitter）：＠JP_Fujiyama
